Ghana Patha of Select Mantras from Krishna Yajurveda
Ghana Patha
Aashirvada Mantras from Krishna Yajurveda - Samhita & Ghana Patha
Asyaamatan Kaama Magne
Ekadhaiva Yajamaane
Lekas Salekas Sulekaha
Mayi Medhaam Mayi Prajaam
Navo Navo Bhavati
Sadasi See Daita
Tasyate Pavitra Pate
Tat Savitur Varenyam
Chamakam Ghana Patha - Krishna Yajurveda
Anuvaaka- I Agnaa Vishnu Sajoshasaa
Anuvaaka- II Ekaacha Chaikaika
Chamakam Samhita Patha- Krishna Yajurveda
Agnaa Vishnu Sajoshasaa

Nakshatra Devata Mantra
Oshadhi Sukta
Ghosha Shanti
Purusha Sukta
Sri Rudram Ghana Patha - Krishna Yajurveda
Anuvaaka- I Namaste Rudra Manyave
Anuvaaka 2 – Namo Hiranyabaahave
Sri Rudram (Laghunyasam) - Krishna Yajurveda
Sri Rudram Laghunyasam
Sri Rudram (Namakam) - Samhita Patha- Krishna Yajur Veda
Sri Rudram
